EmailTemplate.description: This the the project assignment email that's used for customers on the MA Hybrid product
EmailTemplate.name: Project Assignment (Hybrid MA Product)
EmailTemplate.subject: We found a solar farm for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Meet your solar farm
Learn more
You've been matched! We found a local solar farm that can support your energy needs. Read on for more details:
Your solar farm
You have been assigned to the %%SSSName%% located at %%SSSAddress%%, %%SSSCity%%, %%SSSState%% %%SSSZip%%. This farm will create %%SSSKwDC%% kW DC of solar per year which is enough to power %%SSSHomeOffset%% homes annually.
We sized your community solar share based on your current electric usage. If your electricity use changes down the road, you can always reach out to us to request an adjustment.
%%[IF ((NOT Empty(IIf(Empty([SSSEstPTO]), "", DateParse(Format([SSSEstPTO], "yyyy-MM-dd")))) AND DateDiff(IIf(Empty([SSSEstPTO]), "", DateParse(Format([SSSEstPTO], "yyyy-MM-dd"))),IIf(Empty(Now()), "", DateParse(Format(Now(), "yyyy-MM-dd"))),"D") > 0)) THEN]%% %%=BeginImpressionRegion("01__Rule_1__Block_if_farm_is_already_live")=%% %%=ContentBlockById("146443")=%% %%=EndImpressionRegion()=%% %%[ELSE]%% %%=BeginImpressionRegion("01__Default_Content__Block_if_solar_farm_is_under_constructi")=%% %%=ContentBlockById("146442")=%% %%=EndImpressionRegion()=%% %%[ENDIF]%%
Have questions?
We're happy to help. Contact a member of our Customer Care team M-F, 9am-5pm at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or 844.786.4100
Get answers
BlueWave Customer Service: customercare@bluewavesolar.com
